title: Darkness
content:
block line of sight and creatures can see past it just not within it. Eversight Ring negates the Blind effect

Lvl 2 Spells Aid ♦ Arcane Lock ♦ Barkskin ♦ Blindness ♦ Blur ♦ Branding Smite ♦ Calm Emotions ♦ Chromatic Orb: Acid (Lvl 2) ♦ Chromatic Orb: Cold (Lvl 2) ♦ Chromatic Orb: Fire (Lvl 2) ♦ Chromatic Orb: Lightning (Lvl 2) ♦ Chromatic Orb: Poison (Lvl 2) ♦ Chromatic Orb: Thunder (Lvl 2) ♦ Cloud of Daggers ♦ Crown of Madness ♦ Darkvision ♦ Detect Thoughts ♦ Enhance Ability ♦ Enlarge - Reduc
